summary: The module provides utilities to translate a Dance Diffusion audio generation model into the HuggingFace Diffusers format. It defines a generic unconditional diffusion model, handles conversion of layer naming conventions (attention, residual convolutions), downloads checkpoints, and assembles a Diffusers pipeline with appropriate scheduler and UNet components.
business_intent: Allow developers and researchers to reuse existing Dance Diffusion checkpoints within the Diffusers ecosystem, simplifying deployment, inference, and further development of audio diffusion models.
